messageBody:
My Apologies, I should have put one in before ...

In the example below, I have shown a method named,
initLocation, you will see this method checks the
state of the MBean before the method proceeds to do
its stuff..

Please note that this 'StateString' is set by JBoss.

public synchronized String initLocation () {

/* Check if the StateString has "Started" value.
*/
if (!this.getStateString().equals("Started"))
return "Service currently not started ";
try {
popLocals();
this.running = true;
} catch (Exception e) {
this.running = false;
log.error("Error invoking popLocals");
}
}

From your reply I get the feeling, I might have to end
up using cactus, as this 'StateString' is something
which is set by JBoss.

Regards,
Ravi

>
> Lasse
